welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Shefar`am, where ancient history and vibrant culture meet. Get ready to experience the warmth and hospitality of our locals while exploring our beautiful city known for its rich heritage. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haifa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Haifa Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
